text: Silke worked with us to support a global client with strategic marketing plans for the DACH region. Her knowledge of the technology sector and her specific regional insights were invaluable to us and our client. Silke delivered a regional plan that clearly aligned with global priorities, and was specific and measurable. She immediately fit in with our account team and was a pleasure to work with. We are looking forward to the next opportunity to work with her!
company: Founder and Managing Director of Seeblue Marketing Ltd
